name: Marc Rizzo
description: '''Marc Rizzo''' (born August 2, 1977) is an American musician, best known as the former lead guitarist of the metal band [[Soulfly]]. He featured on eight Soulfly albums: ''[[Prophecy (Soulfly album)|Prophecy]]'', ''[[Dark Ages (album)|Dark Ages]]'', ''[[Conquer (Soulfly album)|Conquer]]'', ''[[Omen (Soulfly album)|Omen]]'', ''[[Enslaved (Soulfly album)|Enslaved]]'', ''[[Savages (Soulfly album)|Savages]]'', ''[[Archangel (Soulfly album)|Archangel]]'', and ''[[Ritual (Soulfly album)|Ritual]]''. He has also released five solo instrumental albums: ''Marc Rizzo'', ''Colossal Myopia'', ''The Ultimate Devotion'', ''Legionnaire'', and ''Rotation''.
